# gov-form-label

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                                        | Type                                | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `identifier` | `identifier` | Identifier for label.                                                                                                              | `string`                            | `undefined` |
| `legend`     | `legend`     | Use label as a legend for better accessibility. Note: Don't forget to set the fieldset attribute of the gov-form-control component | `boolean`                           | `false`     |
| `required`   | `required`   | Set whether the input is required or not.                                                                                          | `boolean`                           | `false`     |
| `size`       | `size`       | Label's size.                                                                                                                      | `"l" \| "m" \| "s" \| "xl" \| "xs"` | `'m'`       |


## Events

| Event       | Description                   | Type                        |
| ----------- | ----------------------------- | --------------------------- |
| `gov-click` | Emitted when the label click. | `CustomEvent<PointerEvent>` |
